files.patch:
@@ -758,0 +758,6 @@ + *

  • In Perl, free-spacing mode (comments mode in this + * class) denoted by {@code (?x)} will not ignore whitespace inside of + * character classes. In this class, whitespace inside of character classes + * must be escaped to be considered as part of the regular expression when in + * comments mode.

    • + * @@ -823,0 +829,4 @@ + * + *

    Note that comments mode ignores whitespace within a character class + * contained in a pattern string. Such whitespace needs to be escaped + * in order to be treated as if comments mode were not enabled.
